attributes.action: No Election No Council Taxes! Don’t pay council tax if council cancel elections
attributes.additional_details: Restore ALL Local Elections don’t delay for the SECOND year in a row!! Democracy is at stake!
attributes.background: Why should the voters pay for council taxes when local governments are cancelling the democratic right to vote in the May elections!!

rejection.details:
Since you submitted your petition, the Government has announced that local elections will now go ahead in May 2026. You can read more about this on the GOV.UK website: 

https://mhclgmedia.blog.gov.uk/2026/02/16/update-on-may-2026-local-authority-elections/

If you wish, you can still sign the following petitions, which are already open:

Suspend Council Tax collection in areas with delays to Local Elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755322

Stop the cancellation of Local Elections to help uphold democracy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751384

Remove power to cancel local government elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747234
